title: Cannot Complete Tutorial
body:
Hello. I played a long time ago and decided to start again, and take the tutorial. The tutorial gets to the step "Press B to recall" pressing B does nothing. There is no recall icon just a see through circle and clicking that does nothing.

Is the tutorial glitched or am I missing something obvious here?

replies.body:
There may be an issue with one or more of your keybindings that's causing this issue. You should be able to resolve this after taking a moment to reset your input file that's saved server-side using the steps below:

First,  **log into the League Client** then hop into your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder named **Config**.

Once you've deleted that folder, hop into a custom match or the tutorial to confirm the **B key** actually does something now. Let me know if this worked!
